Dense Layer¶

class sknet.layer.Dense(incoming, units, nonlinearity=1.0, deterministic=None, init_W=<function variance_scaling_initializer.<locals>._initializer>, init_b=<function zeros>, name='')[source]¶

Dense or fully connected layer. This layer implement a fully connected or a dense layer with or without nonlinearity, and batch-norm

Parameters:
  • incoming (tuple of int or Layer) – input shape or incoming Layer instance
  • units (int) – then umber of output units (or neurons)
  • nonlinearity_c (scalar) – the coefficient for the nonlinearity, 0 for ReLU, -1 for absolute value, …
  • deterministic (tf.bool) – a dummy Tensorflow boolean stating if it is deterministic time or testing time
  • batch_norm (bool) – using or not the batch-normalization
  • init_W (initializer of tf.tensor or np.array) – initialization for the W weights
  • init_b (initializer of tf.tensor or np.array) – initialization for the b weights
  • name (str) – name for the layer
